commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Does everyone have the recipes from the ramen shop? We don't have much time until tomorrow, so let's learn as much as we can!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, by the way, Kanan, Dia. We didn't even ask if you were okay with coming along with us. Are you? Do you have anything else planned, or...?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: We couldn't possibly leave at a time like this. We're in this together now. Don't sweat it.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed. We would like Rin to feel better soon, too. Please allow us to help.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kanan, Dia, thank you so much!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Let's start with learning this restaurant's main attraction, the ramen. Rin, will you be our taste tester? Since you're a regular of this place and all.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Sure, leave it to me!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It's complete! This restaurant's top-selling soy sauce ramen! Rin, please give it a taste.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa, it looks spectacular! You're amazing, Dia. Down the hatch! *Slurp* *Gobble*

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: How is it?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: The broth is a bit too thin. I think you didn't drain the water from the noodles enough. The flavors haven't really blended very well, so it's kinda bland overall.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Huh? H-H-How could that be? I was so sure I'd perfectly replicated the dish!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rin's a real harsh critic...!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Try my ramen next. They had a seaweed ramen on the menu, so I tried making that.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It's full of nutrients yet low on calories. A healthy ramen that's good for the body! I think I did pretty well if I say so myself.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Wait, hold on, that's the ONLY thing in this! It's just a bowl piled with seaweed! Where are the noodles?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Don't worry, they're in there. You just gotta dig through the seaweed a bit... See?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Kanan, I understand that seaweed is your favorite food, but that doesn't give you the right to change the recipe.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hmm... This ramen-making thing isn't going too well, huh? I'm pretty certain we're doing it the way the recipe says, but...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hey, Rin? Could you try the soy sauce ramen I made?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Sure. Bottoms up. *Slurp*

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Th-This is it... This tastes just like the ramen I always have! Ayumu, how did you make this?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I pretty much followed the recipe to a T. Except at the very end, I added a bit of vinegar.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Vinegar?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, you said that the ramen here fills you with energy no matter how tired you might be, right? At first, I thought it was just because it's your favorite food.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But then I thought that maybe the owners had added a little something to the ramen itself that would help take away that exhaustion.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I see what she's saying. They do say that acids, such as vinegar or lemon, are meant to bring a weary body back to full health.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Does that mean the people who work here were making me special ramen? I can't believe they were thinking of me this whole time!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I can't be more grateful for the owners and staff of this place!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Looks like we got the ramen down. All right girls, let's figure out the rest of these recipes!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Okay. I want you to try my cooking next.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Fried rice! This dish is super tasty too! Time to eat! *Munch* *Munch* Urk...

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: This rice is like...super clumpy.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What? I-I'm sorry, I was scared of burning the rice, so I kept it on low heat. I guess it just didn't fry all the way through.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: We've got a long road ahead of us, huh?
